welcome_message_body: Welcome to Piedras Negras, Mexico! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant border city, known for its delicious cuisine, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Piedras Negras has to offer.

restaurants.name: La Estancia Steak House

restaurants.address: Av. Carranza Y Guadalajara #100, Piedrasnegras, Coahuila de Zaragoza
